name: LOUD
description:
Pin has found his voice in a world that lost theirs.
This is an atmospheric Action-Plattformer in which your voice is the only waepon against the Mute. After silence took over the world our main character Pin uses his only way of expressing himself to bring back the Noise.

Controls:

For now the Game can be played only with a controller.

- Left Thumbstick: Move and rotate head for attack/shouting direction

- A-Button: Jump (press twice for doublejump; pressing jump against a wall will let you perform wall-jumps)

- X-Button: Light Attack/Shout (is available after a few steps into the level)

- Y-Button: Heavy Attack/Shout (must be charged with four enemy hits)

- Menu Button: Brings you back to the main menu
